thread.section_title: Bluestone Perennials Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bluestone Perennials | www.bluestoneperennials.com
thread.title: Ann Galliher
thread.title_full: Bluestone Perennials reviewed by Ann Galliher

author: Ann Galliher
title: Ann Galliher
text:
I wanted to send a small plant to my niece in GA when her father died and didn't want to send "florist" flowers. I called Bluestone, told them what I wanted and even though it was before their normal shipping date, they graciously took my order, and even enclosed a card with words of condolence on it. My niece got it within two or three days and was so happy with it. I couldn't have had better service!!!
I knew the quality was great, as I had ordered from them last year. I have ordered again, and can't wait to get my healthy, beautiful plants!
